#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<utility>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#define LL long long int
#define mod 1000000007
#define vi vector<int>
#define vvi vector < vi >
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sf(n) scanf("%d",&n);
#define mem(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof(a))
#define pb push_back
#define f first
#define s second
int arr[100005];
using namespace std;
int main()
{	int t,i,j,n,x,y,mx,temp,e,modu,flag,ans,z,dig,test;
	sf(t);
	for(test=1;test<=t;test++)
	{	sf(x);sf(y);
		temp=1;
		mx=0;
		while(temp>0)
		{	arr[mx++]=temp%10;
			temp/=10;
		}
		//cout<<"e "<<e<<endl;
		/*for(i=0;i<mx;i++)
			printf("%d ",arr[i]);
		cout<<endl;*/
		for(e=1;;e++)
		{	//To multiply arr by x;
			temp=x;modu=0;flag=1;
			for(i=0;i<mx;i++)
			{	z=arr[i]*temp+modu;
				arr[i]=z%10;
				modu=z/10;
				//cout<<"modu"<<modu<<" ";
			}
			while(modu>0)
			{	arr[mx++]=modu%10;
				modu/=10;
			}
			//cout<<"mx e"<<mx<<" "<<e<<endl;
			/*for(i=0;i<mx;i++)
				printf("%d ",arr[i]);
			cout<<endl;*/
			temp=y;dig=0;
			while(temp>0)
			{	dig++;
				temp/=10;
			}
			temp=y;
			for(i=mx-dig;i<mx;i++)
			{	//printf("%d ",arr[i]);
				if(temp%10==arr[i])
				{	temp/=10;
				}
				else
				{	flag=0;
					break;
				}
			}
			//cout<<endl;
			if(flag)
			{	ans=e;
				break;
			}
		}
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",test,ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
